eng.Log1: Ah those are called bounceroom, they will help you get to higher place you usually can't
eng.Log2: Seems this door is locked by some sort of spell, there must be a medium for the spell nearby
eng.Log3: The door is locked, we must look for another way
eng.Log4: There are crackles on the wall there, see if you can make a hole from there
eng.Log5: If you wan't run faster, simply hold shift button
eng.Log6: Look what we found, a Key, well at least we can open the front door
eng.Log7: It seems we are trapped here, better look for a way out
eng.Log8: This door is seal by magic, if we manage to open it, im sure that we can get out from here
eng.Log9: That crystal there holds magic power, breaking it should open us the path
eng.Log10: There's the key, we should go back to see which door it is used
eng.Log11: Oh my god! We better run from that thing if you dont want to be crush by it!
eng.Log12: Look there's a switch over there, it is use to control doors

chn.Log1:
这些东西叫弹跳菇，他可以
帮我们到达更高的地方
chn.Log2: 看起来这扇门被某种魔法封住了
chn.Log3: 上锁了，让我们看看有没有别的路吧
chn.Log4:
那些墙体看起来有很多裂隙，
也许你能打破他们
chn.Log5: 你可以按住shift来让自己跑的更快
chn.Log6:
看看我们找到了什么，一把钥匙，
看来我们至少可以从前门进来了
chn.Log7:
看来我们被困住了，找找看有没有
出去的方法吧
chn.Log8:
这扇门被魔法封印了，我敢打赌如
果我们打开它就能从这里出去了
chn.Log9:
那块水晶中流淌着魔法，击碎它应
该能为我们开启新的道路
chn.Log10:
是钥匙，我们最好回头看看它可以
开启哪扇门
chn.Log11: 老天！那玩意肯定会敲碎我们！快跑！
chn.Log12:
看，那是一个开关，他应该是用来
控制某扇门的
